body_html:
@colesbury, yes looks like it:

In [1]: import torch as th
   ...: print(th.__version__)
   ...: x = th.rand(2,4)
   ...: print(x)
   ...: try:
   ...:     print(x[0, [0,1,2,3,4]])
   ...: except RuntimeError as e:
   ...:     print(e)
   ...: print(x[range(1), [0,1,2,3,4]])  # illegal but succeed
   ...:
0.5.0a0+1526718
tensor([[ 0.2457,  0.4224,  0.1400,  0.6743],
        [ 0.9752,  0.6428,  0.9776,  0.2290]])
index 4 is out of bounds for dimension 0 with size 4

body:
@colesbury, yes looks like it:

```
In [1]: import torch as th
   ...: print(th.__version__)
   ...: x = th.rand(2,4)
   ...: print(x)
   ...: try:
   ...:     print(x[0, [0,1,2,3,4]])
   ...: except RuntimeError as e:
   ...:     print(e)
   ...: print(x[range(1), [0,1,2,3,4]])  # illegal but succeed
   ...:
0.5.0a0+1526718
tensor([[ 0.2457,  0.4224,  0.1400,  0.6743],
        [ 0.9752,  0.6428,  0.9776,  0.2290]])
index 4 is out of bounds for dimension 0 with size 4
```
